Posts.EditableText: Anyone know why every time I update my game it deletes my game's title picture?  Kind of frustrating.  Is it me or everyone?
Posts.HTML: Anyone know why every time I update my game it deletes my game's title picture? Kind of frustrating. Is it me or everyone?

Posts.EditableText: You need to upload the picture in the editing interface as well. Simply go to game, scroll down until you see where to upload a picture/put a picture, then upload the picture. Good luck.
Posts.HTML: You need to upload the picture in the editing interface as well. Simply go to game, scroll down until you see where to upload a picture/put a picture, then upload the picture. Good luck.
